citations.narrative:
On Oct. 24, 2023, two black bears (Faith, 24 year old female and Buckingham, 24 year old male) escaped from their
primary enclosure due to an improperly latched gate. The animals were contained inside the perimeter fence and were
returned safely to their primary enclosure within two (2) hours of the escape.
Animal escapes can lead to injury of the animals or to people that are nearby. Maintain the facility in good repair to protect
the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
Corrected on Oct. 24, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
LYNNE WHITE-SHIM, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
On Oct. 24, 2023, two black bears (Faith, 24 year old female and Buckingham, 24 year old male) escaped from their 
primary enclosure due to an improperly latched gate. The animals were contained inside the perimeter fence and were 
returned safely to their primary enclosure within two (2) hours of the escape.  
 
Animal escapes can lead to injury of the animals or to people that are nearby. Maintain the facility in good repair to protect 
the animals from injury and to contain the animals.  
 
Corrected on Oct. 24, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
LYNNE WHITE-SHIM, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist n
